home.heroBody: Capture research notes once and publish them in English or Spanish. The starter blog demonstrates MDX-powered translations, custom footnotes, and a production-ready contact path.
home.highlightsBody: A few snapshots from the last decade of multilingual shipping.

highlights.title: Bilingual MDX posts
highlights.body: Drop an .mdx file per locale and the index automatically pairs translations, highlights fallbacks, and keeps metadata in sync.

highlights.title: Custom footnotes
highlights.body: Use the <Footnote> component anywhere inside a post and the system renders numbered references plus a localized list at the bottom.

highlights.title: Locale-aware contact
highlights.body: A validated contact form surfaces schema errors in the active language and relays sanitized payloads through Nodemailer.

home.cvBody: Seven years leading research-ready content systems across North and Latin America.
home.portfolioBody: Prototype systems, bilingual drip journeys, and async ritual toolkits shipped with small teams.

portfolioProjects.title: Async research notebooks
portfolioProjects.body: Documented rituals in both languages so hybrid squads could reuse insights without translation debt.

portfolioProjects.title: Localized onboarding flows
portfolioProjects.body: Mapped expectations per market and codified tone so product teams could launch aligned UI copy.

portfolioProjects.title: Lightweight design ops
portfolioProjects.body: Built Figma kits with paired EN/ES tokens so designers prototyped in their preferred language.

home.blogSectionBody: Longer notes on bilingual product strategy, MDX workflows, and the contact relays powering this starter.
home.contactSectionBody: Send a bilingual brief and we will route it to the right inbox.

blog.title: Field notes
blog.description: Every article ships with locale-aware metadata. When a translation is missing we gracefully fall back to the closest available language.
blog.fallbackLabel: Showing the {{language}} version while we translate this post.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Send a bilingual request and we'll route it to the right inbox. The handler validates input, localizes errors, and relays via Nodemailer.
